text: Enti, ɔhene Dawid frɛɛ Gibeonfoɔ no nyinaa. Na wɔnka Israelfoɔ no ho, na mmom, wɔyɛ Amorifoɔ21.2 Edin Amorifoɔ yɛ din a wɔde frɛ Kanaanfoɔ nyinaa ansa na wɔredi wɔn so (1 Mose 15.16; Yos 24.18). Nokorɛm, Gibeonfoɔ yɛ Hiwifoɔ (Yos 9.7; 11.19). nkaeɛfoɔ bi. Israel kaa ntam sɛ, wɔrenkum wɔn, nanso ɛsiane Saulo ahopereɛ enti, ɔpɛɛ sɛ ɔtɔre wɔn ase.
